features.featureDescription: Azure Role-Based Access Control (Azure RBAC) can be used to managed access to service's data plane actions.
features.featureGuidance:
Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes supports on-premises and other cloud environments that are integrated with different identity and access management systems. In addition to existing Kubernetes cluster role-based access control (RBAC), Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes supports Azure RBAC to unify access management across Kubernetes clusters and minimize operational overhead.

Please refer to the following article for guidance on Azure RBAC for data plane actions: [Identity and access management for Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/scenarios/hybrid/arc-enabled-kubernetes/eslz-arc-kubernetes-identity-access-management)
features.customerActionsDescription: Follow just enough administration (least privilege) principle
